r.s: PHP documentation rendering package for PhD
r.d: A package for PhD to render the php.net (phpdoc) documentation
r.n: - Fixed bug#46772 Add class reference pages to the man files. (Hannes) - Fixed bug#47650 Overwrite the TOC on changes. (Hannes) - Fix invalid ID on multiple unknown refsect roles. (Hannes) - Added support for "soft-deprecation-notice" attribute on refsynopsisdiv to collect alternate suggestions into the $setup phpweb array. (Hannes)
